# Portfolio Website Project

This is a React-based portfolio website for Alif Ramdani built with Vite featuring a modern, dark-themed design with mint green accents.

## Project Structure
- React 18 with Vite for fast development
- Modern CSS with custom design system following specified color palette
- Responsive layout with hero section and portfolio showcase
- Separated content files (JSON) for maintainability

## Development Guidelines
- Follow the specified color palette: dark background (#282828), mint accent (#08F8B8)
- Maintain responsive design principles with mobile-first approach
- Use semantic HTML structure for accessibility
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Update content through JSON files in `src/data/` directory

## Content Management
- Personal info: `src/data/personal.json`
- Projects: `src/data/projects.json` 
- Services: `src/data/services.json`
- Experience: `src/data/experience.json`

## Design System
- Typography: Poppins font family
- Primary colors: Dark theme with mint green accents
- Layout: Grid-based responsive design
- Components: Modular React components
